item.title: Merge branch 'master' into patch-1
item.description: https://cloud.dgraph.io/pricing?type=free - — Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data trasnfer per day.

item.title: Add Dgraph Cloud
item.description: https://cloud.dgraph.io/pricing?type=free - — Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data trasnfer per day.

item.title: Add Neo4j Aura: Graph DBMS
item.description: https://neo4j.com/cloud/aura/) — Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships - — Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships).

item.title: Add TigerGraph Cloud: Graph DBMS
item.description: https://www.tigergraph.com/cloud/) — Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. 1 TG.Free instance on AWS (4 vCPU, 7.5 GB memory, 50 GB disk) or on GCP(2 vCPU, 8 GB memory, 128 GB disk - — Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. 1 TG.Free instance on AWS (4 vCPU, 7.5 GB memory, 50 GB disk) or on GCP(2 vCPU, 8 GB memory, 128 GB disk). Free instance sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.

item.title: hasura.io: add free limits
item.description: https://hasura.io/ - Hasura extends your existing databases wherever it is hosted and provides an instant GraphQL API that can be securely accessed for web, mobile, and data integration workloads. Free for 1GB/month of data pass-through.

item.title: Update Hasura's offering
item.description: https://hasura.io/ - Hasura extends your existing databases wherever it is hosted and provides an instant GraphQL API that can be securely accessed for web, mobile, and data integration workloads.

item.title: Remove F5: they only do 30-day trials now
Add Duply.co
item.description: https://duply.co - Create dynamic images from API & URL, design template once and reuse it. Free tier offers 70 images/month creation from API & URL and Up to 100 through Form.

item.title: More info on Free plan
item.description: https://backlight.dev/ - With collaboration between developers and designers at heart, Backlight is a very complete coding platform where teams build, document, publish, scale and maintain Design Systems.Free plan allows up to 3 editors working on 1 design system with unlimited viewers.
